c.t: 10.13.010 Who May Adopt and Under What Conditions.
c.sp: library|Pueblo of Picuris Tribal Law and Order Code|10|10.13|10.13.010

c.x: Any adult may file a petition to adopt;
In the case of married persons maintaining a home together, both spouses sh
A married person, legally separated, may adopt without the consent of his/h
The following persons may adopt:
The welfare of the child shall be primary;
A person adopting shall be at least ten (10) years older than the minor;
Extended family members;
Pueblo of Picuris adoptive parents;
Members of another Pueblo;
Any other Indian adoptive parents.
Preference in adoption shall be given in the following order:
Conditions to Adoption.
